permissions: Allowed for admins. For time sheets whose subject is a TruckerShiftSet, allowed for users who are manager members of the trucker or members of the trucker broker. For time sheets whose subject is a CrewRequirement, allowed for users who are job production plan time card approvers.
side_effects: Creates a time sheet unapproval and updates the time sheet status from approved to submitted.
validation_notes: --time-sheet is required. The referenced time sheet must exist. The time sheet must be in approved status to be unapproved; unapproving sets the new status to submitted.
